title: "Google criticizes proposed Patent Office policy changes, citing AI tech"
excerpt: "Google's general counsel Halimah DeLaine Prado has told the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office that proposed changes to a tribunal that hears challenges to patent validity could harm developers and stifle innovation in the fast-growing field of artificial intelligence."
